item.def:
Ocean sport 

Ocean Sports (independently owned and operated) is the official ocean activity company at the resort and provides snorkel and water craft rentals at our four-acre lagoon, as well as towels and sunscreen at our three fresh-water pools. They also have regularly scheduled sail and dive cruises that depart from Anaeho’omalu Bay, a brief shuttle ride from the resort. 

For more details visit http://www... Or call extension 120 from your room or toll free 8989-8989-98 ext 103
item.name: Overview
